animation: Life is like a road, it can be smooth and easy to walk, but sometimes it can be dark and lonely.

When you're happy you enjoy the music , when you're sad you understand the lyrics.
Oh yes the past can hurt, but the way i see it you can either run from it! or learn from it.
Too tired to stay but too scared to leave
Its not the world thats cruel its the people living on it.
No one notices your pain until that shit turns into anger and now your the bad guy.
Everyone is on earth to do something meaningful.
Crying doesn't mean you're weak it just means you've strong for too long.
Roses are dead. Violets are dying. Outside im smiling inside im crying.
